The method to append dialog text to the screen

The method to set dialog text to the screen

The text pane of the window
screenHeight - Static variable in class GameInterface
The height of the screen of the device that this game is running on
screenPanel - Variable in class GameInterface
The panel to house the text screen

The screen size of the device that this game is running on

The width of the screen of the device that this game is running on

The Creature that the user has selected on the interface

The serialVersionUID of this class

Method to set whether or not the Control is available to the user
